manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large blimp floating above the group of people on the bridge, casting a faint shadow on the fog below.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the last three people on the right side of the bridge along with their umbrellas and a section of the railing.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the foggy background with a vibrant sunset over a mountain range, matching the lighting on the people.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Change the weather to a sunny day and add blooming flowers on either side of the bridge, creating a warm feel.
manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a mirror reflection of the bridge and people below, creating a sense of depth in the fog and adding appropriate blur.
